room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Great Escapes Harford in Bel Air
room_description:
Under contract to the CIA, Doctor Blair Falstone developed a powerful mind control formula… then sold it to Organization Z, an international group with plans for world domination. Falstone was arrested on his way out of the country, however, operatives from Z were already on the way to his lab to claim their purchase which is hidden somewhere inside.
You are part of an elite team of scientists called in to prevent a global disaster. You must act quickly and figure out how to use Falstone’s custom equipment to find this dangerous compound before representatives from Z arrive. Their agents will stop at nothing to get what they came for, so this is a high-risk assignment with the fate of humanity hanging in the balance. You have 60 minutes to get the job done. Don’t screw it up!
